title: New Podcast: Myths and Legends, now in Spanish!
itunes:title: New Podcast: Myths and Legends, now in Spanish!
description:
Sonoro and Nextpod (that’s Jason and Carissa Weiser!) present Mitos y Leyendas. The acclaimed podcast about mythology and worldwide folklore, now in Spanish. 

Listen, learn, and subscribe today on your favorite podcast platform to catch all the episodes every week. Available now!

To listen directly on Apple Podcasts: https://play.sonoropodcast.com/LFm7oyx7 

Nextpod.com 

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
